website_summaries.verdict: Perfect size to travel with a morning cup of coffee or an afternoon iced mocha. No need to reheat when you get to work.
pros: Completely leakproof thanks to its lid-lock technology
Because of its compact size it's nice and light
Holds temperatures of hot and cold drinks quite well
cons: Smaller 10-ounce capacity might not suit everyone
If you want a second cup of coffee you'll need a refill

customer_reviews.title: Hot liquids, bad design.
customer_reviews.text: Arctic lava is a great name. It keeps things HOT. Better than any mug I've used. But the lid seal isn't great so it will leak liquid if you don't screw it on just right. And the rubber stopper that plugs the mouth piece when closed has started to smell moldy in just a few months. They also need the redesign the mouth piece completely so people with normal size noses don't get them smooshed when sipping.
customer_reviews.author: ADbuyer

customer_reviews.title: VG
customer_reviews.text: Arctic Lava 320 ml/10 oz Double Wall Vacuum Insulated 18/8 Stainless Steel Travel Tumbler Coffee/Tea Mug with Leak Proof Locking Lid Seals in Freshness and Maintains Temperature does not correspond to seller description: 1. It does leak when you put mug on the side 2. it does not keep temperature of your coffee/tea 3. it is warm to touch even though it says double wall insulated. It is light mug compare to different brand I have which also stated double wall and it is cool to touch when you fill hot water/tea/coffee.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Leaks... sadly...
customer_reviews.text: Take some money out of your wallet... then throw it in the trash... I just chucked mine because it began leaking after minimal use... my money would have been better spent on a different product. It does insulate well though but thats it!
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with no leaks
customer_reviews.text: I always have some liquid with me in my purse. This has never leaked. I wish they were still available to purchase more. I came here looking to buy 2 more. Great product. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: BeverlyHillsLIVE

customer_reviews.title: Lock system actually doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! It keeps the coffee warm for a long time, no leaks, easy to drink, and the small size is perfect. However, I don't like that the "lock system" actually doesn't work, the lid can be opened by pushing the button no matter if it's locked. Then, maybe it's not such a good idea to carry it on a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Camilo Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and compact
customer_reviews.text: This was a great solution to my annoyed feeling went filling up my larger travel mugs with the 10 oz of coffee that my k-cup provides me. I felt weird only filling up my cup half way even though I didnt want to drink more coffee. This 10oz mug is perfect. Its very cute and compact. I throw it in my purse without worrying about it leaking and it stays warm all day.
customer_reviews.author: Karli G.

customer_reviews.title: LEAKY
customer_reviews.text: I have to give this only one star because it leaks when laying on its side. The ad says that you can seal it and throw it in your bag "without worry" but, in my case, that would lead to a big mess. I only see one other complaint of this in the reviews so I'm going to return this one and order another to see if I get a better result. If the new one is leak proof I will update this review to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lid leaks around the main seal.
customer_reviews.text: This keeps coffee hot pretty well but it leaks around the lid seal. Removed the seal to clean and inspect it and found nothing visually wrong. Also tried lubing it with vegetable oil thinking maybe it was kinking as the lid was screwed on but it still leaks. My gym bag and clothes smell like coffee (not a bad thing necessarily but annoying).
customer_reviews.author: awesome man

customer_reviews.title: Too Bad!  It's a Lemon.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and locking ability of this travel mug. Unfortunately, I rate it 2 stars. Opening the lid was fine, but I had such a difficult time removing the inner beige lid to take out the paper and dessicant. Neither my husband nor my brother could not even open it. There's no instructions in the box nor online. Too bad, I'm sure I would have liked it. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: christiu14

customer_reviews.title: What a great travel mug!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these mugs and at first I thought they were really small! Compared to so many out there they are, but then I started using it and it quickly grew in my eyes! Holds the perfect amount of my morning tea, keeps it piping hot and fresh! I love the locking lid. It allows me to confidently put it in my purse without any concern that it will leak and it's size allows it to fit in my purse easily! Great buy on my part!
customer_reviews.author: krs257

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Poor design of lid. If not placed exactly correctly, lid will leak, especially at the hinge where no seal exists. Love that it's small sized; however, this results in parts of lid hitting the nose. Good for carrying hot coffee as long as container isn't being shaken, but overall, not pleasant from which to drink.
customer_reviews.author: Laughing Asian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am getting ready to take a road trip so I ordered this coffee mug, it said it would fit in automobile cup holders. My cup holder in my car is quite small and not many cups fit well in it. This one fits PERFECTLY! It is easy to use with one hand as it had stated and it keeps my coffee very hot until the last drop!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Chenoweth

customer_reviews.title: You pretty much need to pull it open after pressing on ...
customer_reviews.text: The open button doesn't work. You pretty much need to pull it open after pressing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Happyluvu

customer_reviews.text: Loved the color, loved that it did keep my coffee hot, but hated that the flip up lid was in my face when I took a drink :/
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cup
customer_reviews.text: Great cup and it does what it is suppose to do. Keeps coffee hot and liquids cold. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Kept my coffee so hot it takes me three hours ...
customer_reviews.text: Kept my coffee so hot it takes me three hours to drink it. Which has cut down on how much I drink.
customer_reviews.author: jpac1066

customer_reviews.title: This product is one that lives up to its ratings ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is one that lives up to its ratings. It keeps coffee very warm to hot if the lid is kept closed. We put hot water in the tumbler before using it with our coffee and, then, even with opening and reopening it several times, our coffee was still hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful travel mug-- keeps the coffee insanely hot for a ...
customer_reviews.text: wonderful travel mug-- keeps the coffee insanely hot for a long period of time
customer_reviews.author: AMH

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: doesn't keep coffee hot for more than a half hour. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MikeL

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing that the lid that came with my product was ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing that the lid that came with my product was very loose. I will change my rating if I am sent a replacement with a tighter lid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great mug! Not too big and not too small. Keeps my coffee nice and hot!
customer_reviews.author: CRPaul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt leak! Makes my coffee hot and sustain its hot for 5 hrs
customer_reviews.author: Djeufracio

customer_reviews.title: Good mug just small
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your drink hot for a long time but it's kinda small
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P.

customer_reviews.title: My husband uses this for his morning coffee on the ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this for his morning coffee on the way to work. Before, he had tried several different travel mugs and he almost always came home with at least a drop or two of coffee stains on his shirt. But not with this one. He stays clean and the coffee stays hot.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Coral grandmom

customer_reviews.title: Great 10 oz tumbler.
customer_reviews.text: Very good design. Totally leak and spill proof. Easy to open and close, but a bit cumbersome to drink from, yet it's not a big issue. Much better than anything else being offered by other companies in this size, which is actually the only size that fits my cup holder / most of 2017-2018 Audi models/. Preserves temperature well, hot or cold. Good overall quality, both metal and plastic parts, doesn't have "cheap" look or feel. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Abashidze

customer_reviews.title: Dribble cup.
customer_reviews.text: Size was right for my use... 1 cup of coffee. Does keep the coffee hot for a long time. But the spring-load button to pop the top is located poorly. It is right in front of the drinking spout... turning this into a dribble cup when you drink. If you choose to drink from it without the top, you mouth is in contact with a raised, very thin metal that forms the inner part of the cup. I'll keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: This thing looks great and seems to have a good seal
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks great and seems to have a good seal. Just watch out if you’re trying to use it with Keurig’s Large 9.25 oz setting. I bought this specifically for that use, but the cover/seal takes up space inside and pushes some coffee out. I thought it was leaking at first, but realized that it’s just too much liquid. Not sure if the Keurig machine is pushing out more than 9.25 oz, or if this tumbler isn’t actually 10 oz. but I’ve just learned to pour a tiny bit out into the sink after the Keurig’s done brewing a large serving, and everything works out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cool tumbler! It works great and keeps an airtight seal. One of my biggest pet peeves about tumblers is that a lot of them don't seal very well and they leak. This one doesn't. It's super tight and keeps my coffee hot for a long time. The other cool thing about it is the mouthpiece area. It's pretty innovative in that it helps to keep from spilling liquids out the side of your mouth like most lidded mugs. I love this tumbler!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I am a huge coffee drinker, and I am always carrying a coffee mug everywhere. However, I had had many of my coffee mugs leak when I had them inside my purse. THAT IS NOT THE CASE anymore. Not only doesn't leak, but it is just the perfect size to fit in a small bag. The best part of this product, aside from keeping my drink hot, the lid locks to ensure no leaks!! High recommend to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: Great size; perfect for one cup of coffee. My lid lock button doesn't work very well; it still opens when locked. I just carry it in my hand upright or put it in a Ziplock if I plan on carrying it in a bag. Keeps drinks warm for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mellow N.

customer_reviews.title: I love the size
customer_reviews.text: I love the size, does not spill, and it seems it will hold the test of time. It holds the temperature of hot liquids for about two hours (as long as you keep the lid closed). I wish it kept it hot longer like the Contigo - thus the four stars. But then I really bought this item for the size and leakproof features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Bit disappointed. Still a convenient size
customer_reviews.text: It leaks! I bought it as it is a smaller tumbler so it would fit into my husband's lunch bag. But it leaked! so probably needs to be carried upright. Bit disappointed. Still a convenient size. Most tumblers are taller.
customer_reviews.author: Amela CJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size so you don't drink too much coffee. Easy to clean and compact to carry.Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: NOT leak proof :(
customer_reviews.text: It does keep drinks warm, but it leaks. If you are looking for something you can throw in a briefcase and not worry about, keep looking! And then tell me when you find it :)
customer_reviews.author: Wren

customer_reviews.title: Arctic Lava Insulated Cup
customer_reviews.text: This small cut works extremely well. I need a small one to fit under a small coffee pot. It kept my coffee hot for the longest time.
customer_reviews.author: LindaT

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to drink out of
customer_reviews.text: The main issue we have with this cup is the lid. It is quite awkward to drink out of.
customer_reviews.author: michele l mickelson

customer_reviews.title: I returned this because the way the lid is attached ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because the way the lid is attached, it hits me in the face when I drink.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Durable, must have
customer_reviews.text: Use this everywhere I have been going for the last couple of days. Keeps my water fresh!!
customer_reviews.author: Amz Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks & doesnt stay hot.
customer_reviews.text: Only stays hot for 3 hours and then turns warm. And leaks all the time. You spend like 10 minutes making sure its secure properly so it doesnt leak. The size is nice but it is a headache to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: i love this mug .Keeps hot drinks hot for hours once filled and remains securely closed.Does not leak and drinking is easy without spilling hot liquids on self.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Hot & Cold Drinks!!💛💛💛
customer_reviews.text: This mug works perfect for keeping my drinks cold & coffee hot!! I also like the smaller size as is perfect for my one cup of coffee on my short commute and easier to handle than traditional larger sized mugs!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: traveler mug for coffee lover
customer_reviews.text: Arctic Lava traveler mug is perfect for coffee lover. I bought the smaller one because I drink only espresso. and this mug fits under my lever espresso maker, so I can enjoy my favorite coffee on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this travel mug! Perfect size for my drive to work.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for cup of coffee or tea
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for cup of coffee or tea! Well constructed/insulated in keeping my morning java hot/warm. Love it! Pete Chula Vista, CA.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Arctic Lava 10 OZ / 320 ML Double Wall Vacuum Insulated 18/8 Stainless Steel Travel Tumbler Coffee/Tea Mug with Leak Proof Locking Lid (10 oz / 320 ml, Black)
product_meta.description: Help reduce the ever growing landfills by using this Durable, reusable Arctic Lava Stainless Steel Travel Mug at home, work or in the car. Carry it in your back pack while camping and enjoying the nature you are helping to protect. To remove the inner beige lid for cleaning, take the lid off the mug by unscrewing it. Open the lid, and push the tab on the beige lid, located by the hinge toward the spout. At the same time push down on the rim of the beige spout. It will drop out the bottom. To replace it put in back in from the bottom of the opening and snap into place. It will be very snug the first few times you remove it and will remain snug to ensure the leak-proof ability of the mug.
feature_bullets: High quality vacuum-seal double wall insulated construction 1/8 stainless steel provides state of the art insulation for hot and cold liquids. Ensuring your satisfaction in the temperature of your chosen beverage. You can count on it keeping your hot or cold liquids steaming hot or icy cold for 8 hours or more depending on external temperatures and time lid is open

Leak-Proof – Lid locks and seals your liquids inside when closed and seals properly replaced after cleaning. Toss it in your bag without worry. BPA Free easy to clean lid, not dishwasher safe. Flip top stays open during use until you close it. Easy one handed use

To remove the inner beige lid for cleaning, take the lid off the mug by unscrewing it. Open the lid, and push the tab on the beige lid, located by the hinge toward the spout. At the same time push down on the rim of the beige spout. It will drop out the bottom. To replace it put in back in from the bottom of the opening and snap into place. It will be very snug the first few times you remove it and will remain snug to ensure the leak-proof ability of the mug.
Fits in standard automobile cup holders, bottle pockets of backpacks and bags for easy secure transporting
This mug is a single 10 ounce coffee cup size. High quality stainless steel won’t rust or absorb flavors or odors. Silicone base to protect surfaces, and reduce risk of sliding.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars51 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
